scripts.build:api: cd projects/api && npm run build && node ../../scripts/merge-dep.js ../publish_config/package.json && time /t
scripts.build:cli: cd projects/cli && npm run build && node ../../scripts/merge-dep.js ../publish_config/package.json && time /t
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:cli && npm run build:pub_conf && time /t
scripts.compose: node scripts/compose.js && cd ./build && node ../scripts/write-version.js ./version.json && npm i && time /t
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run compose && npm run pack && time /t
scripts.local: npm run build && npm run compose && npm run local-install && time /t
